00195   template <class QueryParameters, class ListObject>
00196 ListObject* QueryProxy<QueryParameters, ListObject>::list()
00197 {

00199   std::string sessionKey;
00200   std::string queryParmetersToString;
00201   char* listObjectInString;
00202   char* errorInfo;

00204 
00205   //If the query uses the machineId (machineId not null)
00206   if (mmachineId.size() != 0) {
00207     profile = diet_profile_alloc(mserviceName.c_str(), 2, 2, 4);
00208   }
00209   else {
00210     profile = diet_profile_alloc(mserviceName.c_str(), 1, 1, 3);
00211   }
00212 
00213   sessionKey = msessionProxy.getSessionKey();
00214 
00215   ::ecorecpp::serializer::serializer _ser;

00217   queryParmetersToString =  _ser.serialize_str(const_cast<QueryParameters_ptr>(&mparameters));
00218   //IN Parameters
00219 
00220   if(diet_string_set(diet_parameter(profile,0), strdup(sessionKey.c_str()), DIET_VOLATILE)) {
00221       msg += "with sessionKey parameter "+sessionKey;
00222       raiseDietMsgException(msg);
00223     }
00224 
00225   //If the query uses the machineId (machineId not null)
00226   if (mmachineId.size() != 0) {
00227

00230       raiseDietMsgException(msg);
00231     }
00232

00234       msg += "with queryParmetersToString parameter "+queryParmetersToString;
00235       raiseDietMsgException(msg);
00236     }
00237 
00238     //OUT Parameters
00239     diet_string_set(diet_parameter(profile,3), NULL, DIET_VOLATILE);
00240     diet_string_set(diet_parameter(profile,4), NULL, DIET_VOLATILE);
00241 
00242     if(!diet_call(profile)) {
00243       if(diet_string_get(diet_parameter(profile,3), &listObjectInString, NULL)){
00244         msg += "by receiving listObjectInString message";
00245         raiseDietMsgException(msg);
00246       }
00247       if(diet_string_get(diet_parameter(profile,4), &errorInfo, NULL)){
00248         msg += "by receiving errorInfo message";
00249         raiseDietMsgException(msg);
00250       }
00251     }
00252     else {
00253       raiseDietMsgException("DIET call failure");
00254     }
00255   }
00256   else {
00257 
00258     if(diet_string_set(diet_parameter(profile,1), strdup(queryParmetersToString.c_str()), DIET_VOLATILE)) {
00259       msg += "with queryParmetersToString parameter "+queryParmetersToString;
00260       raiseDietMsgException(msg);
00261     }

00264     diet_string_set(diet_parameter(profile,2), NULL, DIET_VOLATILE);

00278       raiseDietMsgException("DIET call failure");
00279     }
00280   }
00281 
00282 
00283   /*To check the receiving message error*/
00284   raiseExceptionIfNotEmptyMsg(errorInfo);
00285 
00286   //To parse List object serialized
00287   parseEmfObject(std::string(listObjectInString), mlistObject, "Error by receiving List object serialized");
00288 
00289   return mlistObject;
